short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows to dump local, session storages and cookies, and make custom panels with custom configurations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows to dump and reuse LocalStorage, SessionStorage content and cookies. Also, it provides functionality to create custom DevTools panels for specific Local/Session storage keys and cookie names.
